keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map zl closeTabsOnLeft
map zr closeTabsOnRight
map zc closeOtherTabs

" space is a bad idea.... 
map e  passNextKey

unmap <a-p>
map zp togglePinTab

unmap H
unmap J
unmap K
unmap L

map H previousTab
map L nextTab
map <c-o> goBack
map <c-i> goForward
map <a-n> createTab https://google.com window
